title: Development and validation of Mayaro virus with luciferase reporter genes as a tool for antiviral assays

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mikaela dos Santos Marinho, Ya-Nan Zhang, Natasha Marques Cassani, Igor Andrade Santos, Ana Laura Costa Oliveira, Anna Karla dos Santos Pereira, Pedro Paulo Corbi, Bo Zhang, Ana Carolina Gomes Jardim
